data.message: Really awesome you are still doing some concert dates. Wish you could come to NIagara Falls Canada. you're one of my last concerts to see on my bucket list with my daughter (Hayley lol) (Marylin Manson is the other) but glad you are doing well and so nice to see your face around. (Miss Chester Bennington everyday). You are an amazing lyricist and just so glad to see you and your future just got better. SO happy to see! :) come to Niagara Falls or Toronto PEEAASE! :)
